pages.text:
Meet The Team
Our staff of experienced DJ’s, Emcee’s and entertainment specialists will ensure your event is fantastic! Check out their Bio Below and find out a bit more about our “Genius Team”. We believe that every event, no matter the size, is an opportunity for excellence. Let us be a part of making your next event pure…“Genius”.
Jonathan Davis
DJ JD
Jonathan is a true Party Rocker!!! Serving as both DJ and MC, he is a perfect fit for ANY Event. This awesome and versatile entertainer delivers an amazing music selection and smooth mixing style!! If great music and a packed dance floor is what you are after, look no further than DJ JD!
Gary McClain Jr.
DJ Ruckus
Gary is a consummate Entertainer and has been a Genius DJ all along. He is a high energy DJ who’s skill on the turntables is matched only by his skills on the dance floor. From Weddings to Birthday Parties he is the right fit for ANY event and take your party to the next level. “Lets make a Ruckus!”
Rodney Moseley
DJ Rodney
DJ Rodney Mosley isn’t just a DJ and MC; he’s a master of crafting electric atmospheres. With years of experience, he possesses an uncanny ability to read and ignite any crowd, transforming events into seamless, high-energy experiences. Rodney ensures a non-stop, memorable experience, leaving guests exhilarated and on their feet.

Mobile DJ’s
Genius Entertainment is a full service Mobile DJ and Entertainment company serving North and Central Florida!
GET QUOTE
GENIUS WEDDINGS
Genius Entertainment makes your Wedding dreams come true with Professional DJs and MCs.
GET QUOTE
PARTIES
We love to party! More importantly, we want to ensure your party or event is everything you hoped it would be.
MEET TEAM
CORPORATE EVENTS
We offer flexibility for your Individual needs. State of The Art Equipment, and a Highly Trained and Talented Staff.
SERVICES
We Are “GENIUS”
We are the leading and most trusted Entertainment and Mobile DJ company with locations in Gainesville Florida, St. Augustine / Jacksonville, Genius Entertainment provides amazing service, plenty of references, and an unmatched music library. We have been serving our clients for 15+ years and have the experience, music, and skill for ANY event!.
GET QUOTE
Our Services
We provide Professional DJs for ANY event including: Weddings, Bar/Bat Mitzvahs, Sweet 16s, Corporate and Charity Events and much MORE! Our packages offer a full range of DJ and MC services, Lighting and Effects, Video DJ and Karaoke Services, and Audio/Visual Packages for meetings and special events. We provide ALL of these services with Effortless Customer Service , Flawless Execution and Genuine Commitment To Excellence.
Mobile Dj's
Our DJs are trained in the “Art” of DJing and are not just pressing “next” on a playlists.
Lighting & Effects
Our lighting solutions transform any space, creating the perfect atmosphere for your occasion.
Custom Music List
The right music sets the mood, keeps the energy flowing, and keeps your guests dancing!
Emcees
Our MC’s are clear, personable, and always there to get the crowd engaged.
Flawless Execution
At Genius we believe that every event, no matter the size, is an opportunity for excellence.
We Bring The Party
We love what we do and our high energy DJ’s keep the party going! Get your quote today.
Full Service Professional DJ’s For Any Event
We provide DJs and MCs for Weddings, Bar/Bat Mitzvahs, Birthday Parties, School Events, Corporate Events, Community and Charitable Events and much more!
GET QUOTE
Mobile DJ Packages
We provide Comprehensive Audio Visual (AV), Sound & Lighting, Entertainment, and Entertainment Production services for ANY Event with Effortless Customer Service and Flawless Execution. Looking for an instant quote for your next event? Click on the Get Quote button in our main menu above, pick your area and receive an instant quote when you fill our our check availability form!

Reviews
We love what we do and our clients think so too!
We had many people tell us that this was the greatest wedding dj they have ever seen. We had so much fun! Tell jd thanks. We plan to write a great review when back from our honeymoon.
Robert & Jasmine
